name: Rogue Nightmare
description:
LAUNCH IN FULLSCREEN!!! May have to use CTRL+(-) or CTRL+(+) to fit in window!!!

Rogue Nightmare is an action game where you play as a nightmare who has decided to turn sides and protect the dreamer. You and your nightmare ego must work together and protect the dreamer from nightmares in the world of their dreaming mind.

How to Play

  • WASD to move
  • SHIFT to dash

Complex Mechanics

  • Dashing/Moving into an enemy nightmare will reset your Dash
